page.title: 04Hayle Cricket Club.
page.content: The Hayle Cricket Club is positioned on Hayle Towans.It has got a new pavillion with a bar,pool table and a darts board.Upstairs there are changing rooms for both teams with showers.The Cricket Club has got four teams.There is the senior team,the seconds team,the under sixteens and the under thirteens.This season two West Indian cricketers have joined the club.One of them is a batsman and the other is a fast bowler.The Membership fee is two pounds for non playing members.On Friday nights the two West Indians come over and another senior team member to coach children to inprove their cricket skills.
